hint.text: Use the formula for an isothermal irreversible change

solution.text:
For an isothermal irreversible change. \(q =\;- w = p_e(V_f - V_i)\)
\(\implies q =\;- w = 0\;(_{l}_ - _{k}_)\)
\(\implies q =\;- w = 0\) litre-atm

content.text: _{k}_ litres of an ideal gas at a pressure of _{j}_ atm expands isothermally into a vacuum until its total volume is _{l}_ litres. How much heat is absorbed and during the expansion?
